name: Valeera
title: Shadow of the Uncrowned
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second. Awards 1 Combo Point. Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 130 damage in an area around Valeera. Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit. Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun and damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point. 1 Point: 85 2 Points: 170 3 Points: 255 Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

heroics.name: Smoke Bomb
heroics.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

heroics.name: Cloak of Shadows
heroics.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

original.name: Valeera
original.title: Shadow of the Uncrowned
original.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.
original.shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.

baseHeroInfo.name: Valeera
baseHeroInfo.title: Shadow of the Uncrowned
baseHeroInfo.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Vanish
trait.description: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible. After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

abilities.name: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second. Awards 1 Combo Point. Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 130 damage in an area around Valeera. Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit. Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun and damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point. 1 Point: 85 2 Points: 170 3 Points: 255 Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

heroicAbilities.name: Smoke Bomb
heroicAbilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

heroicAbilities.name: Cloak of Shadows
heroicAbilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

otherAbilities.name: Ambush
otherAbilities.description: Ambush an enemy, dealing 130 damage and reducing their Armor by 10 for 4 seconds. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.

otherAbilities.name: Cheap Shot
otherAbilities.description: Deal 30 damage to an enemy, Stun them for 0.75 seconds, and Blind them for 2 seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

otherAbilities.name: Garrote
otherAbilities.description: Deal 20 damage to an enemy and an additional 140 damage over 7 seconds, and Silence them for 2.75 seconds. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.

trait.name: Vanish
trait.description: Vanish from sight, becoming Stealthed, gaining 20% Movement Speed and access to new Abilities. For the first second, Valeera is Unrevealable and can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible. After being Stealthed for 3 seconds, Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote have 100% increased range, and cause Valeera to teleport to the target when used.

abilities.name: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, hitting all enemies in a line for 110 damage. If Sinister Strike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second. Awards 1 Combo Point. Stealth: Ambush Heavily damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 130 damage in an area around Valeera. Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit. Stealth: Cheap Shot Stun and damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Eviscerate an enemy, dealing damage per Combo Point. 1 Point: 85 2 Points: 170 3 Points: 255 Stealth: Garrote Silence and damage an enemy over time.

heroicAbilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

heroicAbilities.name: Cloak of Shadows
heroicAbilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%. Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

otherAbilities.name: Ambush
otherAbilities.description: Ambush an enemy, dealing 130 damage and reducing their Armor by 10 for 4 seconds. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Sinister Strike Dash forward, damaging enemies.

otherAbilities.name: Cheap Shot
otherAbilities.description: Deal 30 damage to an enemy, Stun them for 0.75 seconds, and Blind them for 2 seconds once Cheap Shot's Stun expires. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Blade Flurry Deal damage in an area around Valeera.

otherAbilities.name: Garrote
otherAbilities.description: Deal 20 damage to an enemy and an additional 140 damage over 7 seconds, and Silence them for 2.75 seconds. Awards 1 Combo Point. Unstealth: Eviscerate High damage finishing move.

skins.name: Shadow of the Uncrowned
skins.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.

skins.name: Bloodfang Valeera
skins.description: There's no actual proof Valeera infiltrated Blackwing Lair and slew its master at the bequest of her king... but, I mean, there wouldn't be, would there?

skins.name: Demon Hunter Valeera
skins.description: The difference between Valeera and her enemies was simple. They would stop at nothing to destroy Azeroth, whereas she would sacrifice everything to save it.

skins.name: Vampire Slayer V
skins.description: Not all of Raven Court's vampires swear fealty to the Raven Lord. The one known only as "V" has launched a solitary crusade against her own kind, making her an unlikely ally of the Vampire Slayers.

auxiliaryHeroInfo.name: Valeera
auxiliaryHeroInfo.title: Shadow of the Uncrowned
auxiliaryHeroInfo.description: For a time, the gladiator Valeera Sanguinar served dutifully as one of Varian Wrynn's personal bodyguards. Now, her shadowy skills find her a natural fit within the secretive rogue order, the Uncrowned, in their fight against the Legion.
auxiliaryHeroInfo.shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who specializes in shutting down her opponents.
